title: Find a compulsory basic training (CBT) course for motorcyclists

details.description: Find your nearest approved training body (ATB) running the compulsory basic training (CBT) course for motorcyclists
details.introduction:
Find your nearest approved training body (ATB) running the compulsory basic training (CBT) course for motorcyclists. 

*[CBT]: Compulsory basic training
*[ATB]: Approved training bodies

tags.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
What you need to do to ride a motorcycle or moped - tests and training, minimum ages, vehicle requirements
Learner motorcycle and moped riders must take compulsory basic training (CBT) before riding on the road - fees, booking information, training, tests and certificates
What happens in the motorcycle practical test, motorcycle rules, fees, special needs, cancelled tests
